attributes.action: Make lies and misleading propoganda within the media and politics unlawful
attributes.background: There have been many lies and misleading information in the media and politics recently and it effects everyone. It is damaging to our social construct and is powerful enough to manipulate people into thinking in specific directions

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
